manhood.translation[0].definitions[0].de: qualities such as strength, courage, and sexual power, that people think a man should have
manhood.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Why did he feel he had to prove his manhood in the company of women?
manhood.translation[0].definitions[1].de: the state of being a man and no longer a boy
manhood.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: He had barely reached manhood when he married.
manhood.translation[0].definitions[2].de: all the men of a particular nation
